content.prompt: Which of the following is a central goal for planning concepts such as New Urbanism?

choices.label: Creation of walkable cities that are environmentally friendly and contain a diversity of business, entertainment, and residential areas with large areas of green space
Creation of affordable housing such as clusters of high-rise apartment buildings to house low-income residents
Redesign of neighborhoods to replace older historic structures with multistory office buildings and modern residences
Creation of adequate streets, beltways, and parking spaces for automobiles and reduction in public transit options
Repeal of zoning regulations that limit construction of new single-family housing developments

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes
